comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See www.goodgolfforlife.com/vardonray.htm for one person's suggestion as to what is going on. He indicates, and I agree, that the written date is 9/15/13 (not 9/12/13 as Wystan noted). NYT of Feb 15, 1920 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9801E3DD103BEE32A... indicates that on September 13, 1913, Vardon and Ray beat Smith and Low at Baltusrol. Some online copies of this picture (or shots very like it) indicate Baltusrol (golf course in Springfield NJ) as the location.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: And now I've found a report at the time of the match query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E07E6D9123FE633A... the second piece in this excerpt from the NYT of September 14, 1913

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks!  We'll add the full names, date and probable location to the source data next time we update.
